sid.description: The unique identifier for the conversation.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the conversation.

chat_service_sid.description: The SID (Service Identifier) for the chat service to which the conversation belongs.

messaging_service_sid.description: The SID for the messaging service associated with the conversation.

friendly_name.description: A human-readable name assigned to the conversation.

unique_name.description: A unique name assigned to the conversation for easy identification.

attributes.description: Additional attributes or metadata associated with the conversation.

date_created.description: The date and time when the conversation was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the conversation was last updated.

state.description: The current state of the conversation (e.g., active, inactive).

timers.description: Information about timers set for the conversation.

bindings.description: Information about the communication channels bound to the conversation.

url.description: The URL endpoint for accessing or interacting with the conversation data.
